title: Six Nations highlights: France overcome Wales in thrilling clash

description: Seoul says the 229 new cases raise the total number of confirmed infections to 433.

title: Ilkeston NatWest hole in wall rises up TripAdvisor rankings
description: Internet jokers cause a circular hole outside a bank to rise up the TripAdvisor rankings.

title: Women's T20 World Cup: Sri Lanka's Atapattu launches huge six against New Zealand
description: Sri Lanka captain Chamari Atapattu hits a huge six against New Zealand during their T20 Women's World Cup match in Perth.

title: Simon Warr: BBC broadcaster and former teacher dies aged 65

title: Elderly wild bear roams California town
